Welcome!
You have reached the personal webpage of Camila Pacheco-Riaño.
I am global change ecologist and  biogeographer currently studying biodiversity lag responses to climate change at the University of Bergen (Norway). The underlying aim of my research is to determine what are the sources of the complex patterns of biodiversity change observed over time around the mountains of world. 

This website is under construction.
